parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.78

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>global

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if the vehicle has its laser turned on. Not to be confused with [[isIRLaserOn]] which is for units

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isLaserOn''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_on = [[isLaserOn]] _vehicle;</code>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]: True when laser is on, otherwise false

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableIRLasers]] [[isIRLaserOn]]
</value></part></template>
